Name: Chaordic
About the game: STORY Platformer of the underworld. You play as an orb-a creature with magical abilities named Neakay. Upgrade your hero's abilities and defeat an army of enemies. FEATURES Skill system A system of improving the attributes of the character The ability to change the appearance(skins) Challenging levels HD Graphics Secret places There are screamers Not working gamepad
